title: holy crap Fallout 4 is amazing
body:
just completed this quest that I found after beating the main story that gives you access to top-secret Enclave weaponry and tech (yes, thats a next-generation android. It was originally built to replace powered infantry altogether, but like the microfusion cells they were developed too late, along with the first microprocessors, and only a few remained).

http://i.imgur.com/sJ10Gg0.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/hWDSKFh.jpg[/img]

just look at the level of detail on this gun holy crap:
http://i.imgur.com/5ikPP8E.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/BFeibLL.jpg[/img]
oh yeah and you fight a new BoS branch-off
http://i.imgur.com/b6hltBC.jpg[/img]
one of the three remaining androids:
http://i.imgur.com/ocRA0WN.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/mMHxqwz.jpg[/img]
that armor lmao
http://i.imgur.com/Z1gFoUL.jpg[/img]
toward the end of the quest:
http://i.imgur.com/ZiHK3K5.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/9FNnEw8.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/5Mcz1Yr.jpg[/img]

these androids can only be controlled during the quest, but afterwards you can opt to make them followers if you want, which is SUPER useful because these things are WALKING TANKS. Also, you can only get this quest if you beat the main story on the hardest difficulty, among other things.

http://i.imgur.com/fSwhI4F.jpg[/img]
